description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpAdminState is modified.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminStateChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminState i 1

description: The administrative state of the PTP.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminState

description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpAdminWavelength is
modified.

event.Summary: PTP laser wavelength set to $v4 nm

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminWavelengthChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminWavelength i 9999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The interface index of the PTP.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex

description: The wavelength of the laser expressed in nm. This value is directly
related to cienaCesPtpAdminFrequency and will be 0.00 when the laser
is unset or disabled. The laser wavelength (or frequency) must be set
before the laser can be turned on.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminWavelength

description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpAdminFrequency is modified.

event.Summary: PTP laser frequency set to $v4 GHz

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminFrequencyChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminFrequency i 9999

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The interface index of the PTP.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex

description: The frequency of the laser expressed in GHz. This value is directly
related to cienaCesPtpAdminWavelength and will be 0.00 when the laser
is unset or disabled. The laser frequency (or wavelength) must be set
before the laser can be turned on.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpAdminFrequency

description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpTxPower is administratively
modified.

event.Summary: PTP laser output power set to $v4 dBm

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpTxPowerChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpTxPower i 9999

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The interface index of the PTP.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex

description: The output power of the laser expressed in dBm.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpTxPower

description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpLineSysType is modified.

event.Summary: PTP line system type set to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpLineSysTypeChangeNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex i 9999 CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpLineSysType i 1

variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: The interface index of the PTP.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpIfIndex

description: The line system type of the PTP. The PTP must be otn-service disabled
before this value may be changed.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-PTP-MIB::cienaCesPtpLineSysType

description: This notification is sent when cienaCesPtpOptimizationMode is
modified.
